verses.verse: Why stand <S%H5975><s%> you afar off <S%H7350><s%>, O Lord <S%H3068><s%>? why hide <S%H5956><s%> you yourself in times <S%H6256><s%> of trouble <S%H6869><s%>?

The wicked <S%H7563><s%> in his pride <S%H1346><s%> does persecute <S%H1814><s%> the poor <S%H6041><s%>: let them be taken <S%H8610><s%> in the devices <S%H4209><s%> that <S%H2098><s%> they have imagined <S%H2803><s%>.

For the wicked <S%H7563><s%> boasts <S%H1984><s%> of his heart <S%H5315><s%>'s desire <S%H8378><s%>, and blesses <S%H1288><s%> the covetous <S%H1214><s%>, whom the Lord <S%H3068><s%> abhors <S%H5006><s%>.
The wicked <S%H7563><s%>, through the pride <S%H1363><s%> of his favor <S%H639><s%>, will not seek <S%H1875><s%> after God <S%H430><s%>: God is not in all his thoughts <S%H4209><s%>.

His ways <S%H1870><s%> are always <S%H6256><s%> perverted <S%H2342><s%>; your judgments <S%H4941><s%> are far above <S%H4791><s%> out of his sight <S%H6887><s%>: as for all his enemies, he puffs at them <S%H6315><s%>.
He has said <S%H559><s%> in his heart <S%H3820><s%>, I shall not be moved <S%H4131><s%>: for I shall never <S%H1755><s%> be in adversity <S%H7451><s%>.

His mouth <S%H6310><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> of cursing <S%H423><s%> and deceit <S%H4820><s%> and fraud <S%H8496><s%>: under his tongue <S%H3956><s%> is mischief <S%H5999><s%> and vanity <S%H205><s%>.

He sits <S%H3427><s%> in the lurking places <S%H3993><s%> of the villages <S%H2691><s%>: in the secret places <S%H4565><s%> does he murder <S%H2026><s%> the innocent <S%H5355><s%>: his eyes <S%H5869><s%> are secretly set <S%H6845><s%> against the poor <S%H2489><s%>.

He lies in wait <S%H693><s%> secretly <S%H4565><s%> as a lion <S%H738><s%> in his den <S%H5520><s%>: he lies in wait <S%H693><s%> to catch <S%H2414><s%> the poor <S%H6041><s%>: he does catch <S%H2414><s%> the poor <S%H6041><s%>, when he draws <S%H4900><s%> him into his net <S%H7568><s%>.
He crouches <S%H1794><s%>, and bows <S%H7817><s%> himself <S%H2489><s%>, that the poor may fall <S%H5307><s%> by his strong ones <S%H6099><s%>.
He has said <S%H559><s%> in his heart <S%H3820><s%>, God <S%H410><s%> has forgotten <S%H7911><s%>: he hides <S%H5641><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%>; he will never <S%H5331><s%> see it <S%H7200><s%>.
Arise <S%H6965><s%>, O Lord <S%H3068><s%>; O God <S%H410><s%>, lift up <S%H5375><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%>: forget <S%H7911><s%> not the humble <S%H6035><s%>.
Why does the wicked <S%H7563><s%> show contempt to <S%H5006><s%> God <S%H430><s%>? He has said <S%H559><s%> in his heart <S%H3820><s%>, God will not look at it <S%H1875><s%>.

You have seen <S%H7200><s%> it <S%H5027><s%>; for you behold mischief <S%H5999><s%> and spite <S%H3708><s%>, to repay <S%H5414><s%> it with your hand <S%H3027><s%>: the poor <S%H2489><s%> commits <S%H5800><s%> himself unto you <S%H5826><s%>; you are the helper of the fatherless <S%H3490><s%>.

Break <S%H7665><s%> you the arm <S%H2220><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> and the evil <S%H7451><s%> man <S%H1875><s%>: seek out his wickedness <S%H7562><s%> until you find <S%H4672><s%> none <S%H1077><s%>.
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is King <S%H4428><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> and ever <S%H5703><s%>: the heathen <S%H1471><s%> are perished <S%H6><s%> out of his land <S%H776><s%>.

Lord <S%H3068><s%>, you have heard <S%H8085><s%> the desire <S%H8378><s%> of the humble <S%H6035><s%>: you will prepare <S%H3559><s%> their heart <S%H3820><s%>, you will cause your ear <S%H241><s%> to hear <S%H7181><s%>:
To judge <S%H8199><s%> the fatherless <S%H3490><s%> and the oppressed <S%H1790><s%>, that the man <S%H582><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> may no more <S%H3254><s%> oppress <S%H6206><s%>.
